text: is a 1964 Japanese psychological thriller movie directed by Hiroshi Teshigahara and was based on the 1962 novel of the same name by Kōbō Abe. It stars Eiji Okada, Kyōko Kishida and Kōji Mitsui. It was nominated for 2 Academy Awards. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1964 thriller movies Category:1960s psychological movies Category:Japanese thriller movies Category:Movies directed by Hiroshi Teshigahara Category:Movies set on beaches Category:Movies set in deserts Category:Movies about educators Category:Movies about widowhood Category:Movies based on books
title: Woman in the Dunes
